column4: Anyone having good sucess with the  ATI Radeon Mobility HD 3650 in laptops?  Strange stuff here.
Starts good once.  Reboot no X environment.  Reboot in windows/ video card is not detected by HAL.  Reboot Is detected by driver, then reboot back into 8.10 is fine.
Once I boot 8.10, I cannot reboot directly back into it without booting windows first like it resets the mode/status of the Video card.
its a wonder they have fglrw working with xorg 7.4
I will wait for them.... Loving the distro.
This Lenovo Thinkpad W500 really new.  Im pleased with how well it does work so far out of the box.  Best experience I have had so far.
next is an acer gemstone, they look cool
Just a couple audio things and the video problem, but mostly great.
I hope Canonical can get profitable.  I Love Kubuntu/Ubuntu.
try xubuntu too, well cool blue
Lighter desktop xubuntu right?  Have played little in past.
if you have a nice pc the lighter stuff does not matter
for me the DE in xubuntu is a bit small
Dual core 2.8, 4 gig and 7200 rpm 160 gig laptop.  Does well.
no problem with any DE your pc :)
